page.title: 11Favourite Food at Woodthorpe
page.content: If the children in our school had to choose their Favourite meal, it would be: {First Course: Soup (Tomato, Oxtail, Chicken) {Main Course: Fish Fingers, Roast Beef, Beefburgers or Corned Beef. Chips (Nearly everyone loves chips!) Peas, Baked Beans or Sweetcorn (all from a tin!) or carrots (fresh) {Sweet: Lemon meringue pie or treacle pudding and custard. When it came to{drinks}most people wanted some kind of fizzy drink.Most preferred shandy (a little beer and a lot of lemonade). Children are not allowed to drink {alcoholic drinks,}and most of those who had tried them did not like them very much.
